Title: Requires drivers' licenses to include a distinguishing mark indicating that the licensee has a permit to carry a concealed firearm
Summary: Requires drivers' licenses to include a distinguishing mark indicating that the licensee has a permit to carry a concealed firearm; authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles to access the statewide license and record database to ascertain the names of persons who have a license to carry a concealed firearm.
LawCode: Amd ยง504, V & T L; amd ยง400.02, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the penal law, in relation to requiring drivers' licenses to include a distinguishing mark indicating that the licensee has a permit to carry a concealed firearm
